description.en: Facilitate networking (online and in person), the exchange of experiences, and mutual assistance among people who energize communities.
description.es: Objetivo: Facilitar el networking (online y presencial), el intercambio de experiencias y la ayuda mutua entre personas que dinamizan comunidades.

description.en: Website that brings together more than 500 tech communities in Spain and other Spanish-speaking countries (online).
description.es: Objetivo: Crear el mayor directorio (open data) de comunidades tech presenciales y online, y una interfaz web para poder explorarlo.
